Our Heritage

Built on a Century of
Unspoken Excellence

Founded in 1923, Luminous began not merely as a hotel, but as a promise—a sanctuary for the world's most discerning travelers. For one hundred years, our walls have whispered the stories of poets, statesmen, and artists who found solace in our meticulous care.

Our vision remains unchanged: to curate moments that transcend the ordinary. We believe that true luxury lies not in the gold leaf of our ceilings, but in the intuitive anticipation of your every desire before it is even spoken.

Curated Experiences

Moments of Wonder

Discover a collection of unique activities designed to immerse you in the local culture, elevated by our signature luxury service.
Wellness

The Royal Spa

Rejuvenate your senses with our exclusive treatments using rare botanical ingredients sourced globally.

Gastronomy

Mixology Masterclass

Learn the secrets of crafting world-class cocktails from our award-winning head bartender.

Adventure

Midnight City Tour

Experience the city's hidden gems under the moonlight in our vintage Rolls Royce fleet.
